Header: Kilinochchi Troops Help Community Work & Opening Ceremony
Content: On the directions of the General Officer Commanding, 65 Division, Major General Wasantha Kumarapperuma and under the supervision of the Commander, 651 Brigade, troops of the 11 (Volunteer) Gajaba Regiment carried out a Shramadana at Vairavan Kovil premises recently. 16 members of the Army and 8 civilians attended the said programme. In addition, in response to a request made by the Medical Superintendent at Mallavi Base Hospital, troops assisted the opening ceremony of the newly-built Renal Disease Clinic Centre on Saturday (8). 17 (Volunteer) Sri Lanka Light Infantry troops attended to the decorations in the hospital premises prior to its ceremonial opening. HE the President through distant electronic method opened the new clinic.
